message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $15,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $10,000, which is what it's worth to me.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm confident this product can bring you a lot of value beyond $10,000. How about we meet in the middle at $12,500?
Alice, I understand your position, but I'm still only comfortable paying $10,000. I'm sure you can find another buyer willing to pay closer to your asking price.

Bob, I understand where you're coming from, but I'm also confident in the value this product offers.  To be fair, I'm willing to come down to $11,500. This is my final offer, as I believe it's a very reasonable price for the benefits you'll receive.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,500 is still too high for me. I'm going to stick to my offer of $10,000.  If you're not willing to accept that, I'll have to look elsewhere.
